sentences.en: Because your love is better than life, my lips will glorify you.
sentences.cn: 3因你的慈爱比生命更好, 我的嘴唇要颂赞你.

sentences.en: But, if they seek to glorify God, let them not lift heavenward their unclean hands!
sentences.cn: 不过, 要是他们追求为上帝增辉添光, 那就不要把肮脏的双手朝天举起吧!

sentences.en: Could we in our new identity as bereaved parents still find a way to glorify God?
sentences.cn: 我们这对痛失爱女的父母,是否仍能找到荣耀上帝的方法?

sentences.en: For you have been bought with a price. So then glorify God in your body.
sentences.cn: 20因为你们是重价买来的. 这样,就要在你们的身体上荣耀神.

sentences.en: For you have been purchased at a price. Therefore, glorify God in your body.
sentences.cn: 你们原是用高价买来的, 所以务要用你们的身体光荣天主.

sentences.en: He just knows how to glorify himself, do not overestimate him.
sentences.cn: 他这人只会自我吹捧, 你可别高看了他.

sentences.en: He will glorify Me, for He will take of Mine and will disclose it to you.
sentences.cn: 约16:14他要荣耀我.因为他要将受于我的、告诉你们.

sentences.en: Rev. 15:4 Who will not fear, O Lord, and glorify Your name?
sentences.cn: 启十五4主啊, 谁敢不敬畏你, 不荣耀你的名?

sentences.en: Should the ax glorify itself above him who chops with it?
sentences.cn: 15斧岂可向用斧砍伐的自夸 呢 ?

sentences.en: Spirit, we love you, we and adore you, Glorify Thy name in all the earth.
sentences.cn: 圣灵, 我爱你, 我赞美你,敬拜你.荣耀主圣名,全地赞美. 荣耀主圣名,荣耀主圣名, 荣耀主圣名,全地赞美.

sentences.en: This magazine in no way glorifies gangs.
sentences.cn: 本杂志决不美化各种犯罪团伙。

sentences.en: We are called to glorify God and to enjoy him forever.
sentences.cn: 我们被神呼召来荣耀祂,并永远享受与祂同在.

sentences.en: We sing hymns to glorify God.
You glorify them. They're not movie stars.
sentences.cn: 你美化了他们. 他们不是电影明星.

sentences.en: You would glorify with the most fervent gratitude the God.
sentences.cn: 你会用最热忱的感激崇拜上帝.

words.tran_cn: 光荣地；辉煌地；壮观地，壮丽地

trans.tran_en: to praise someone or something, especially God

trans.tran_cn: 赞美，颂扬，美化，使更壮丽
trans.tran_en: to make someone or something seem more important or better than they really are
